title: [Health] Trump health policies led to 461,000 avoidable deaths each year, according to an extremely comprehensive public health report published today by The Lancet

[Medicine] Researchers have found a promising potential treatment for obesity. Once-weekly injections of semaglutide in conjunction with lifestyle interventions resulted in significant, sustained reduction in weight of participants with overweight or obesity. Mean weight reduction over 68 weeks was 15.3 kg.
